text: 2017 Afghanistan attack may refer to: *January 2017 Afghanistan bombings *February 2017 Supreme Court of Afghanistan attack *March 2017 Kabul attack *2017 Nangarhar airstrike *2017 Afghanistan–Pakistan border skirmish *May 2017 Kabul attack *3 June 2017 Kabul bombing *June 2017 Herat mosque bombing *June 2017 Kabul mosque attack *June 2017 Lashkargah bombing *24 July 2017 Kabul bombing *2017 attack on the Iraqi embassy in Kabul *August 2017 Herat mosque attack *28 December 2017 Kabul suicide bombing
title: 2017 Afghanistan attack
